chapters.title: The Evolution of Online Transactions
chapters.summary: This chapter explores the origins and development of online transactions, highlighting key milestones and technological advancements.

chapters.title: Early Days of Internet Commerce
chapters.summary: This chapter delves into the early days of the internet and the first attempts at online transactions, including the challenges faced and initial solutions.

chapters.title: The Birth of E-commerce Giants
chapters.summary: This chapter discusses the rise of major e-commerce platforms like Amazon and eBay, and their impact on the growth of online transactions.

chapters.title: The Role of Payment Gateways
chapters.summary: This chapter examines the development of payment gateways and their critical role in facilitating secure and efficient online transactions.
